summary: Add some content to the first floor of the Hjerim House.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Hjerim is, from my point of view, the best available home nowadays. 
Besides, it has a lovely room on the first floor, where we can place what we want. A chance, \'cause we need a forge !

Enjoy your newly well equiped home !
If you have some suggestions, feel free to add a comment !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=82c46c][size=5]Features[/size][/color]

[color=ff0000]v1.2[/color]
- Realism enhancement
- Lightning reworked

[color=ff0000]v1.1[/color]
- Housecarl support

[color=ff0000]v1.0[/color]
- Available in two languages (Francais, English)
- two chest in the back of the room 
- an anvil
- a workbench
- a grindstone
- a tanning rack


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=82c46c][size=5]Work in progress :[/size][/color]
- more customizable mod
- complete remake mod

[color=82c46c][size=5]To do :[/color][/size]
- find new ideas !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=82c46c][size=5]Compatible (and recommanded) mods[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2394]Volek\'s chests mod for the secret room[/url]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2723]Volek\'s marker for houses[/url]
[/center]
author: Deyve

files.name: Hjerim Blacksmith English v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Housecarl room fixed :
housecarl bed moved to the ground floor
all items in the room deleted
rugs and decorating objects keeped

files.name: Hjerim Blacksmith v1_2
files.changelogHtml:
More lights added to the forge room
Brasero added near the anvil for more realism
The chests are now empty
NMM installer added to the archive
